content: I’m not sure where it’s going either. But think of east & west Germany also. And South Africa after apartheid. As timeless forces play themselves out, all I know is to be true to myself & to act on my convictions. Mine include listening. As a lifelong introvert, I’ve learned when this is and isn’t useful. The times are testing our character and soul. My convictions also include courageous compassion and “justice &liberty for all.” I will hold on to them, live them, and hope &pray they prevail.
